component.name: listPullRequest
component.description: Get a list of of a repository's open pull requests.

component.name: updatePullRequest
component.description: Updates an existing pull request. The pull request's status must be open.

component.name: mergePullRequest
component.description: Accept a pull request and merges into the destination branch.

component.name: listPullRequestComments
component.description: Gets the array of comments on the specified pull request.

component.name: getPullRequestDiff
component.description: Gets the diff or patch for a pull request.
